ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "updated_at":"2022-11-03T04:09:07Z", "content":"

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
MÃ¼hlenstraÃe 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (GeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
GefÃ¼hrt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

" }

  "uri":"mastodon.social",

  "languages":[
    "en"
  ],
  "registrations":false,
  "approval_required":false,
  "invites_enabled":true,
  "configuration":{
    "statuses":{
      "max_characters":500,

      "image_size_limit":10485760,
      "image_matrix_limit":16777216,
      "video_size_limit":41943040,
      "video_frame_rate_limit":60,
      "video_matrix_limit":2304000
    },

    }

  "contact_account":{
    "id":"1",
    "username":"Gargron",
    "acct":"Gargron",
    "display_name":"Eugen",
    "locked":false,
    "bot":false,
    "discoverable":true,
    "group":false,
    "created_at":"2016-03-16T00:00:00.000Z",
    "note":"\u003cp\u003eFounder, CEO and lead developer \u003cspan class=\"h-card\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://mastodon.social/@Mastodon\" class=\"u-url mention\"\u003e@\u003cspan\u003eMastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, Germany.\u003c/p\u003e",
    "url":"https://mastodon.social/@Gargron",

    "avatar_static":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/dc4286ceb8fab734.jpg",
    "header":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/000/001/original/3b91c9965d00888b.jpeg",

{ "id": "8", "content": "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "starts_at": null, "ends_at": null, "all_day": false, "published_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "updated_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z", "read": true, "mentions": [], "statuses": [], "tags": [], "emojis": [], "reactions": [ { "name": "bongoCat", "count": 9, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png" }, { "name": "thonking", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png" }, { "name": "AAAAAA", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png" }, { "name": "ð¤", "count": 1, "me": true } ] }

Notification.description: Represents a notification of an event relevant to the user.

properties.description: The id of the notification in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The type of event that resulted in the notification.
properties.name: type

properties.description: The timestamp of the notification.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.
properties.name: account
status
properties.description: Status that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `favourite`, `reblog`, `status`, `mention`, `poll`, or `update`.

properties.name: report
properties.description: Report that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `admin.report`.

ScheduledStatus.description: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.
ScheduledStatus.name: ScheduledStatus

properties.description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The timestamp for when the status will be posted.
properties.name: scheduled_at

properties.description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.
properties.name: params
params[text]
properties.description: Text to be used as status content.
Poll to be attached to the status.
properties.name: params[poll]

properties.description: The poll options to be used.
properties.name: params[poll][options[]]

properties.description: How many seconds the poll should last before closing.
properties.name: params[poll][expires_in]

properties.description: Whether the poll allows multiple choices.
properties.name: params[poll][multiple]

properties.description: Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.
properties.name: params[poll][hide_totals]
params[media_ids]
properties.description: IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.

properties.name: params[sensitive]
properties.description: Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.
The text of the content warning or summary for the status.
properties.name: params[spoiler_text]
params[visibility]
properties.description: The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.

properties.name: params[in_reply_to_id]
properties.description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.

properties.name: params[language]
properties.description: The language that will be used for the status.
ID of the Application that posted the status.
properties.name: params[application_id]
params[scheduled_at]
properties.description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.

properties.name: params[idempotency]
properties.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.
Whether the status should be rate limited <!-- TODO: What does this mean -->.
properties.name: params[with_rate_limit]
media_attachments
properties.description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.

ScheduledStatus.exampleJson:
{
  "id": "1",
  "scheduled_at": "2022-09-29T00:00:00.000Z",
  "params": {
    "poll": null,
    "text": "test post",
    "language": null,
    "media_ids": null,
    "sensitive": null,
    "visibility": null,
    "idempotency": null,
    "scheduled_at": null,
    "spoiler_text": null,
    "application_id": 3,
    "in_reply_to_id": null,
    "with_rate_limit": false
  },
  "media_attachments": []
}

Account.name: Account
Account.description: Represents a user of Mastodon and their associated profile.
Account.exampleJson:
{ "id": "23634", "username": "noiob", "acct": "noiob@awoo.space", "display_name": "ikea shark fan account", "locked": false, "bot": false, "created_at": "2017-02-08T02:00:53.274Z", "note": "

:ms_rainbow_flag:â :ms_bisexual_flagweb:â :ms_nonbinary_flag:â #awoo#admin#bi#nonbinary#games@dzuk

", "url": "https://awoo.space/@noiob", "avatar": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/023/634/original/6ca8804dc46800ad.png", "avatar_static": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/023/634/original/6ca8804dc46800ad.png", "header": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/023/634/original/256eb8d7ac40f49a.png", "header_static": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/023/634/original/256eb8d7ac40f49a.png", "followers_count": 547, "following_count": 404, "statuses_count": 28468, "last_status_at": "2019-11-17T00:02:23.693Z", "emojis": [ { "shortcode": "ms_rainbow_flag", "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/028/691/original/6de008d6281f4f59.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/028/691/static/6de008d6281f4f59.png", "visible_in_picker": true }, { "shortcode": "ms_bisexual_flag", "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/050/744/original/02f94a5fca7eaf78.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/050/744/static/02f94a5fca7eaf78.png", "visible_in_picker": true }, { "shortcode": "ms_nonbinary_flag", "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/105/099/original/8106088bd4782072.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/105/099/static/8106088bd4782072.png", "visible_in_picker": true } ], "fields": [ { "name": "Pronouns", "value": "they/them", "verified_at": null }, { "name": "Alt", "value": "@noiob", "verified_at": null }, { "name": "Bots", "value": "@darksouls, @nierautomata, @fedi, code for @awoobot", "verified_at": null }, { "name": "Website", "value": "http://shork.xyz

properties.description: The account id.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The username of the account, not including domain.
properties.name: username
acct
properties.description: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to `username` for local users, or `username@domain` for remote users.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The location of the user's profile page.
The profile's display name.
properties.name: display_name
note
properties.description: The profile's bio or description.

properties.name: avatar
properties.description: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.
A static version of the avatar. Equal to `avatar` if its value is a static image; different if `avatar` is an animated GIF.
properties.name: avatar_static
header
properties.description: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.
A static version of the header. Equal to `header` if its value is a static image; different if `header` is an animated GIF.
properties.name: header_static

properties.description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.
properties.name: locked

properties.description: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs.
properties.name: fields

properties.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.
properties.name: emojis
bot
properties.description: Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.

properties.name: group
properties.description: Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.
Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.
properties.name: discoverable
noindex
properties.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.
Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.
properties.name: moved
suspended
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.
An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.
properties.name: limited

properties.description: When the account was created.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: When the most recent status was posted.
properties.name: last_status_at
statuses_count
properties.description: How many statuses are attached to this account.
The reported followers of this profile.
properties.name: followers_count
following_count
properties.description: The reported follows of this profile.

Admin::Dimension.name: Admin::Dimension
Admin::Dimension.description: Represents qualitative data about the server.

properties.description: The unique keystring for the requested dimension.
properties.name: key

properties.description: The data available for the requested dimension.
properties.name: data
id
properties.description: The account ID of the mentioned user.
The username of the mentioned user.
properties.name: username

properties.description: The location of the mentioned user's profile.
properties.name: url
acct
properties.description: The webfinger acct: URI of the mentioned user. Equivalent to `username` for local users, or `username@domain` for remote users.

Announcement::Account.name: Announcement::Account
Announcement::Account.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.

Admin::DomainAllow.name: Admin::DomainAllow
Admin::DomainAllow.description: Represents a domain allowed to federate.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the DomainAllow in the database.
The domain that is allowed to federate.
properties.name: domain
created_at
properties.description: When the domain was allowed to federate.
The ID of the email block in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The SHA256 hash of the canonical email address.
properties.name: canonical_email_hash

StatusSource.description: Represents a status's source as plain text.
StatusSource.name: StatusSource

properties.description: ID of the status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The plain text used to compose the status.
properties.name: text
spoiler_text
properties.description: The plain text used to compose the status's subject or content warning.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the Role in the database.
The name of the role.
properties.name: name
color
properties.description: The hex code assigned to this role. If no hex code is assigned, the string will be empty.
A bitmask that represents the sum of all permissions granted to the role.
properties.name: permissions

properties.description: Whether the role is publicly visible as a badge on user profiles.
properties.name: highlighted

Role.name: Role
Role.description: Represents a custom user role that grants permissions.

properties.name: id
properties.description: An identifier for the rule.
The rule to be followed.
properties.name: text

Rule.description: Represents a rule that server users should follow.
Rule.name: Rule
